name: Late Update
overview:
LateUpdate.com is an online hub for Fresno news, information, events and community. Founded by homegrown reporter and entrepreneur Adrian Rodriguez, the site features daily and weekly news with community blogs and features such as Classified Ads, an Events Calendar, and local Interactive Maps.

Registration is free to readers and comes with social networking tools including a profile page, forums, tools to establish Friendships to other profiles, and a user-edited wiki about Fresno.

LateUpdate.com launched in September 2007.

The company values Integrity, Ethics, Immediacy, Teamwork and Community. The site was launched in September 2007 and is based in Fresno, Calif. The owner of LateUpdate.com is Adrian Rodriguez, a native of Fresno who earned a bachelor’s degree in journalism from Fresno State in 2004.

The content management system that powers Late Update was developed by Joomla! http://www.joomla.org under the open source GPL license.
